headline: Gemini Unveils XRP Credit Card With Crypto Rewards – Up to 4% Back, $200 Bonus
summary: Gemini has announced the launch of a special-edition XRP credit card in partnership with Ripple, giving U.S. customers a new way to earn cryptocurrency rewards on everyday spending. The product, unveiled this week, offers up to 4% back in XRP with no annual fees, positioning itself as one of the ...

headline: MasterCard (MA) Is Considered a Good Investment by Brokers: Is That True?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), MasterCard (MA) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: How Investors May Respond To Mastercard (MA) Expanding Digital Payments Through New Travel Partnerships
summary: Earlier this month, Thomas Cook (India) Limited announced the rollout of contactless cross-border payments via Google Pay and Mastercard, enabling secure, mobile-based international transactions for Indian travelers; meanwhile, BMO launched the travel-focused BMO Escape Credit Card in partnership with Mastercard, expanding rewards and flexibility for cardholders. These collaborations exemplify Mastercard’s expanding role in powering global digital and mobile payments, offering enhanced...
